settings.modal_text: “ tried the Eveline body lotion and I’m so impressed! It melts into the skin like a dream, leaving it soft, smooth, and glowy without any greasy feel. The scent is super fresh and subtleperfect for everyday wear.Honestly, it feels like a little spa moment in my daily routine Highly recommend if you’re looking for something hydrating but lightweight!”

“Absolutely love the Eveline Lip Oil! It feels super lightweight and non-sticky, yet keeps my lips hydrated all day. Gives a beautiful glossy finish without feeling heavy. I use it on its own or over lipstick—works perfectly both ways. Totally worth it for the price!”
“I’ve been using this serum for a couple of weeks now, and I can already see a difference! My skin feels super hydrated and looks more radiant.”
“I was skeptical at first, but after using these products for a few months, my skin’s never looked better. I love how they don’t just cover problems—they really help my skin heal and glow naturally.”
“I was skeptical at first, but after using these products for a few months, my skin’s never looked better. I love how they don’t just cover problems—they really help my skin heal and glow naturally.”

“This day cream has become a staple in my morning routine! It’s super lightweight, absorbs quickly, and leaves my skin feeling soft and fresh all day. I love that it’s fragrance-free—perfect for my sensitive skin.”

“I’m obsessed with this lip oil! It feels like butter on the lips, and gives me that juicy, glazed-donut shine without being sticky. The hydration is unreal. My lips feel soft and nourished for hours. Total 10/10 for everyday glam or no-makeup days. Basically… if you’re not drippin’, wyd?”

“This is my new go-to for everyday makeup. Just a few dabs and I look fresh instantly. It’s not sticky, gives a nice glow, and works great on both lips and cheeks. So handy and cute!”
“Koric cleansing balm is honestly a game-changer! It melts off all my makeup so easily—even waterproof products”

settings.heading: Hear from them
settings.subheading: Because no one tells it better than those who’ve seen the results themselves

settings.title: CLEANSER
settings.description: Start your skincare with Carbon Theory Anti-Breakout Facial Cleansing Gel that purifies pores, removing dirt, oil, and bacteria for clearer skin.

settings.title: Toner
settings.description: Then use Carbon Theory Breakout Control Facial Purifying Tonic that rebalances skin’s pH, tightens pores, and preps your face to better absorb serums and treatments.

settings.title: ESSENCE
settings.description: Boost your hydration, repair skin barrier, and enhance texture with COSRX Advanced Snail 96 Mucin Power Essence to create the perfect base for serums and moisturizers to follow.

settings.title: moisturise
settings.description: Lock in all the goodness with this Eveline Niacinamide Therapy Cream Ampoule that controls oil, reduces blemishes, and strengthens the skin barrier.

settings.title: Protection
settings.description: Finish your routine with Sun Protection Face Cream SPF3 — a daily essential that shields your skin from harmful UV rays to prevent aging, pigmentation, and sun-damage.

settings.title: CLEANSER
settings.description: Start by gently cleansing dry skin with Revolution Skincare Ceramides Hydrating Cleanse enriched with ceramides and hyaluronic acid to support your skin’s moisture barrier, leaving it soft, fresh, and calm.

settings.title: SERUM
settings.description: Follow up with Revolution Skincare Plumping & Hydrating Serum (2% Hyaluronic Acid)— it delivers intense hydration, plumps and softens dry skin, locking in moisture for a smooth, dewy finish.

settings.title: moisturise
settings.description: Seal in all the goodness with Revolution Miracle Cream— a rich, nourishing blend of murumuru butter and vitamin E that comforts dry, flaky skin and restores lasting hydration and balance.

settings.title: TREATMENT
settings.description: Lightweight yet powerful, COSRX Advanced Snail 96 Mucin Power Essence hydrates, repairs, and soothes— boosting elasticity and leaving skin smooth and glowing.

settings.title: PROTECT
settings.description: Lastly, Eveline Cosmetics Sun Protection Face Cream SPF 30 is a lightweight, vitamin-enriched sunscreen that protects, hydrates and soothes dry, sensitive skin without a greasy finish.

settings.title: Cleanser
settings.description: Carbon Theory Anti‑Breakout Facial Cleansing Gel detoxifies and purifies oily-prone skin with charcoal and tea tree oil. Gently removes grime without stripping moisture—for clear, balanced skin.

settings.title: tone
settings.description: Revolution Skincare Blemish & Pore Refining Serum (10 % Niacinamide + 1 % Zinc) Lightweight serum controls sebum, minimizes pores, and soothes blemishes. Oil-free, calming formula to refine texture professionally.

settings.title: serum
settings.description: Evolution Skincare Blemish & Pore Refining Serum (10% Niacinamide + 1% Zinc) controls sebum, calms blemishes, and refines pores with a lightweight, oil-free formula.

settings.title: moisturise
settings.description: Miracle Cream is a hydrating gel moisturizer with niacinamide and hyaluronic acid that balances oil, smooths texture, and prevents shine—lightweight and non-greasy.

settings.title: protect
settings.description: Sun Protection Face Cream SPF30 is your essential final step—protects daily against UV rays to prevent aging, pigmentation, and sun damage.

settings.title: cleanse
settings.description: Eveline Vit‑C Energy Soothing Face Wash Gel‑Oil 3‑in‑1 gently cleanses, hydrates, and calms redness with rose extract and vitamin C—perfect for sensitive, reactive skin.

settings.title: serum
settings.description: Serum Shot 2% Hyaluronic Acid Moisturization (30ml) deeply hydrates sensitive, dry skin with hyaluronic acid, trehalose, and panthenol—soothes irritation and strengthens its protective barrier.

settings.title: moisturise
settings.description: Dr. Pawpaw Your Gorgeous Skin Hydrating Day Cream (45ml) is a fragrance-free, gentle Korean formula that boosts radiance and hydration—ideal for sensitive skin needing daily care.

settings.title: treatment
settings.description: Eveline Serum Shot 10% Niacinamide + Zinc (30ml) is a lightweight serum that reduces inflammation and redness. Niacinamide with zinc calms sensitivity and improves texture.

settings.title: protect
settings.description: Eveline Soft Nourishing Cream for Sensitive Skin (200 ml) is a rich, non-greasy moisturizer with Swiss botanical actives that instantly calms, replenishes, providing long-lasting comfort and barrier protection.

settings.quote_text: “Invest in your skin. It is going to represent you for a very long time” — Linden Tyler

settings.heading: DID YOU KNOW?
settings.subheading: 85% of dull skin is due to lack of hydration and fatigue. The fix?
settings.subtext: a serum that hydrates, revives & restores glow — all in one drop!

settings.heading: Skincare Essentials
